affiliation: Support Engineer & Trainer, Internet Systems Consortium
name: Alan Clegg
biography: Alan Clegg has over 20 years providing support and management of Internet facing systems. As a Dale Carnegie trained public speaker, Alan has provided tailored learning experiences to corporations (Banc One, Jefferson Pilot Communications), at conventions and meetings (BSDcon, InfraGard, HTCIA), and as part of his job with Berkeley Software Design.
